title: Hidden mall survivor stash discovered!
body: Found a stash behind the old library, full buffet!

comments.author: u/DecayDave
comments.body: @OP Nice find! The library usually smells like old paper and despair, but a buffet? Did you catch the scent of any fresh survivors nearby?

replies.author: u/ShamblingSally
replies.body: @DecayDave I smelled them too! Wandered over but my arm fell off near the fiction section. A total waste of a good feast.

comments.author: u/GoreGourmet
comments.body: @OP Finally! I've been gnawing on dry bones for weeks. Is the location secure, or do we need to bring the horde to overrun the barricades?

replies.author: u/FreshTurnFred
replies.body: @GoreGourmet I can join the horde! Still getting used to the whole 'shambling' thing... tripped over my own foot twice today. Any brains left?
